summary: An email from Michael Lyon, owner of Lyon Aviation, to an unspecified recipient, providing a tip about private jet flights to St. Thomas that he believes were connected to Jeffrey Epstein. He describes a specific flight in February 2015 and identifies charter broker Dan Ryan as a key figure arranging frequent flights, likely for Epstein.

persons.name: Michael Lyon
persons.role: Owner of Lyon Aviation Inc, tipster
persons.context: He is the sender of the email, providing a tip about suspicious private jet flights to St. Thomas that he believes were connected to Jeffrey Epstein, based on his 35 years in aviation.

persons.name: Dan Ryan
persons.role: Owner of BIG FLY INC, charter broker
persons.context: Identified by Michael Lyon as the charter broker who frequently arranged flights to St. Thomas from various US locations, suspected to be working for Jeffrey Epstein or his representatives.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email tip suggests that the frequent private jet flights to St. Thomas, arranged by Dan Ryan, were likely on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein, based on the pattern and timing after the news broke about Epstein.

connections.description: Michael Lyon suspects Dan Ryan, as a charter broker, was working for Jeffrey Epstein or his representatives to arrange frequent private jet flights to St. Thomas.
Michael Lyon's company, Lyon Aviation, performed a flight on behalf of Dan Ryan, the charter broker, in February 2015.

events.title: Suspicious private jet flight to St. Thomas
events.description: Lyon Aviation transported a lone woman from Boston to St. Thomas on a private jet; the woman was questioned for several hours by St. Thomas Customs on her return on February 10, 2015, and claimed to be an escort.

events.title: Return flight and customs questioning
events.description: The lone woman returned from St. Thomas to Boston; she was questioned by St. Thomas Customs for several hours, revealing she was an escort, not involved with drugs.

keyFacts: Michael Lyon, an aviation company owner, provided a tip about frequent private jet flights to St. Thomas arranged by charter broker Dan Ryan, which he suspects were for Jeffrey Epstein.
A specific flight on February 7-10, 2015, involved transporting a lone woman from Boston to St. Thomas and back; she was questioned by customs and identified as an escort.
Dan Ryan is identified as the charter broker who frequently arranged flights to St. Thomas from various US locations, including Los Angeles, over many years.
Michael Lyon believes Dan Ryan would have passenger names and payment sources for these flights, which could be relevant to the Epstein investigation.
